thread.title: Bayern Munich Midfielder Momoko Tanikawa Signs Contract Extension
thread.title_full: Bayern Munich Midfielder Momoko Tanikawa Signs Contract Extension

author: Lucas Fernandez - World Editor
title: Bayern Munich Midfielder Momoko Tanikawa Signs Contract Extension
text:
Bayern Munich Secures Midfielder Momoko Tanikawa with Contract Extension Through 2029 MUNICH ‌ – Bayern Munich has ‍announced a contract extension for ⁣women’s team midfielder Momoko Tanikawa,keeping the Japanese international with the club through 2029. The deal rewards a breakout season for the 20-year-old ⁢and signals Bayern’s commitment to building a competitive squad ⁢for years‍ to come.
Tanikawa initially joined Bayern in January 2024,spending a subsequent year with Swedish side Rosengård before returning‌ to‍ Munich at the start of the current year. She quickly became a key contributor, playing a important role in Bayern’s Frauen Bundesliga and DFB-Pokal Frauen double last season. ​Tanikawa also showcased her talent on the international stage, leading Bayern to victory ⁣in the inaugural World Sevens tournament where she earned both Top Scorer and Best player honors.
The Nagoya native has continued her notable ⁢form this season, recently scoring three‌ goals in consecutive away matches against Paris Saint-Germain and TSG Hoffenheim .
“I’m very happy and‍ looking forward⁣ to the coming years in Munich,” Tanikawa said. “Since my arrival, I’ve really felt at home‍ in the team‍ and was warmly welcomed right from the start. It gives me great pleasure to be ⁢part of this team. bayern is one of the biggest clubs in the world and‍ it’s a great⁤ honor for‍ me to wear this jersey. In the future, I want to continue to show my qualities, constantly improve and be successful​ with the team so we win lots of trophies with the club.”
